name: Reach (Kushinab)
description:
*SOMETIMES THE GAME WILL START AND ONLY ONE TRAP VISIBLE. RESTART THE GAME* 

Very early test build/prototype of an idea I had that tests you against a metroidvania style + indiana jones + tomb raider style game filled with traps. 

Uploading for playtesting. Please feel free to provide subjective feedback. 

SPACE  = JUMP

WASD = MOVE

Z = DASH

X = MELEE (No function at the current moment)
